name: Go to Sleep (KrakenZero89)
description:
After weeks of unexplained murders,
 the unknown killer still haunts this place.
 After the scant evidence found,
 a young woman claims that she survived
 one of the alleged murderer's attacks.
According to the resources describing him,
 he has long hair that covers his face,
 deep-set eyes, pale skin, and a Joker-like smile,
 giving him a terrifying appearance.
IMPORTANT: This game is NOT mine,
 I don't know the original creator,
 the only thing I did was publish it here on itch io
